description:
A letter from a client summons Conan, Ran, and Kogoro to Moonshade Island, a small island in Izu. However, the client is a pianist who allegedly died 12 years ago while playing the "Moonlight Sonata." In order to investigate their client, they head to the community center, where the previous mayor`s second anniversary memorial service is being held. During the service, the Moonlight Sonata begins to play...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le meurtre de la Sonate au clair de lune (1re partie)
جريمة قتل سمفونية ضوء القمر (الجزء الأول)
ピアノソナタ『月光』殺人事件 (前編)
